name: Accella
tagline: W/in scope, On Budget, Deadlines met, Happy Client
description: Accella designs, builds, and integrates websites and mobile applications based on our client’s requirements.  Whether it’s implementing an idea from scratch, or migrating an existing website/application, our dedicated project managers and design team work with our clients to make sure their ideas and visions are implemented on time, in budget, and within scope.
